Name: Girl And Demon 1
About the game: About This Game Follow in the footsteps of Seraphina, the princess of Artolia. On the adventure to find the monster king's heart for her father. Discover strange events. Collect rare treasures. The turn based combat is easy to learn, while the huge number of strategies adds unprecedented depth. Key Features - Engaging, dramatic plot- Rich battle system - Hundreds of skills & equipments for you to freely customize your characters
